intro: Rhodiola asiatica, commonly known as the Asian rhodiola, is a perennial flowering plant native to the cold regions of Asia. Rhodiola asiatica is also valued for its medicinal properties, traditionally used in herbal remedies for its adaptogenic and antioxidant effects.
